title: Spot XRP ETFs Outpace Market With 12-Day Inflow Streak Nearing $1B Mark
contentSnippet: The sustained accumulation of capital by spot XRP ETFs is establishing XRP as the fastest-growing major crypto-asset vehicle.

title: Bitcoin now settles Visa-scale volumes, but most is for wholesale, not coffee
contentSnippet: Bitcoin settled $6.9 trillion in the past 90 days as a growing alternative to traditional settlement networks, but its global merchant adoption remains only a fraction of international giants.

title: Uneasy Stability: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Dec. 3, 2025

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Reclaims $93K as Altcoins Stage Rebound
contentSnippet: A broad rally lifted major tokens on Wednesday, with bitcoin and ether bouncing and the majority of altcoins surging, even as ZEC extended a weekly slide.

title: Australian Bitcoin Group Challenges ABC News Over 'Misleading' Coverage
contentSnippet: The ABIB claims that ABC "misrepresented Bitcoin's purpose" and conflated it with criminal activity in its coverage.

title: Gensler separates Bitcoin from pack, calls most crypto ‘highly speculative’
contentSnippet: In a Bloomberg interview, former SEC Chair Gary Gensler reiterated that Bitcoin stands apart from thousands of other crypto tokens, which he described as “highly speculative” assets.

title: Cayman Islands Web3 foundations jump 70% as CARF reporting rules arrive
contentSnippet: Cayman foundation registrations increase by 70% year-on-year as DAOs seek legal wrappers, with CARF rules set to arrive in 2026.

title: UK Passes Law Formally Recognizing Crypto as Property
contentSnippet: The Property (Digital Assets etc) Act received Royal Assent on Tuesday, the final step of an act becoming law after being passed by the U.K. Parliament.

title: Further, 3iQ launch $100M fund that compounds returns in Bitcoin
contentSnippet: Further and 3iQ have launched a $100 million market-neutral crypto hedge fund for institutions, including a Bitcoin share class that reinvests gains in BTC.

title: Bitcoin adds $732B in new capital this cycle as market structure transforms
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s latest bull cycle produced a very different market structure, defined by larger institutional participation, lower volatility and deeper liquidity.

title: Strategy Faces Possible MSCI Index Removal, Threatening Billions in Outflows: Reuters
contentSnippet: A removal could lead to outflows of up to $8.8 billion if other index providers follow suit because the stock is part of many passive investment products.

title: Bitcoin Short-Term Holder Shakeout Could Accelerate Recovery Above Key Level
contentSnippet: A breakout above $93,000 could trigger a short squeeze, analysts say—accelerating Bitcoin’s recovery amid short-term holder capitulation.

title: Babylon’s Trustless Vaults to Add Native Bitcoin-Backed Lending Through Aave
contentSnippet: Babylon is also planning to introduce Bitcoin-backed DeFi insurance, letting BTC holders earn yield while underwriting risk against hacks and exploits.

title: Ethena’s synthetic USDe contracts sharply as dollar-backed stablecoins expand
contentSnippet: Ethena’s USDe shed 24% of its supply in November, losing market share as fiat-backed stablecoins including USDT, USDC, PYUSD and RLUSD added billions.

title: Bitcoin traders hit peak unrealized pain as ETFs start to turn positive
contentSnippet: Bitcoin traders are facing the most pressure of this cycle in terms of unrealized losses, but analysts argue that ETFs only accounted for a maximum of 3% the recent selling pressure.

title: Bitcoin Bollinger Bands repeat ‘parabolic’ bull signal from late 2023
contentSnippet: Bitcoin Bollinger BandWidth plumbed new record lows after printing a classic “green” signal in November that previously saw a 40% BTC price upside.

title: Taiwan Authorities Say Island's First Regulated Stablecoin Will Debut Next Year
contentSnippet: Regulators have not decided whether the token will be tied to the Taiwan dollar or the U.S. dollar, a choice that will determine how deeply it tests the island’s currency controls.

title: Daily crypto liquidations nearly triple as leverage overheats: Glassnode
contentSnippet: Daily futures wipeouts are surging as leverage builds, with a record unwind in October exposing how deeply derivatives now shape Bitcoin’s market cycle.

title: XRP ETF、13取引日で8億ドル（約1240億円）到達　仮想通貨史上2番目の速さ
contentSnippet: XRP現物ETFが上場13日で8億ドル超の流入を達成し、ビットコインETFに次ぐ史上2番目の速さを記録。ソラナETFを大きく上回るペースで、アナリストは最大1兆円超の市場規模を予測。

title: バイナンス（海外）、15種類の現物取引ペアを停止へ　12月5日実施
contentSnippet: バイナンス（海外）は流動性レビューに基づき、12月5日に現物取引ペア15種を停止すると発表。停止は特定ペアのみで、対象トークンの上場廃止を意味しない。取引ボットも同時に終了予定。

title: BlackRock's Spot Bitcoin ETF Options Secure U.S. Top 10 Ranking With 7.7M Active Contracts
contentSnippet: IBIT options are the ninth largest in the U.S.

title: Binance names co-founder Yi He co-CEO alongside Richard Teng
contentSnippet: Crypto exchange Binance appointed co-founder Yi He as co-CEO, tightening its top team as it leans into regulated global expansion.

title: Yi He, Arguably Crypto's Most Powerful Woman, Becomes Binance’s New Co-CEO
contentSnippet: The new leadership role was announced by the current Binance CEO Richard Teng at Binance Blockchain Week in Dubai.

title: This Bitcoin-Led, Institutionally Anchored Cycle Shows the Three-Month Drop Isn’t a Winter: Glassnode
contentSnippet: Glassnode and Fasanara’s year-end report shows record inflows, rising realized cap, and falling volatility, suggesting the latest pullback is a mid-cycle reset rather than the start of a long downturn

title: ゲンスラー前SEC委員長「仮想通貨は投機的」　ビットコイン除く全トークンに警告
contentSnippet: ゲンスラー前SEC委員長がブルームバーグのインタビューで、ビットコインを除くすべての仮想通貨を「極めて投機的」と評価。退任後も投資家保護の重要性を強調し、規制の観点からビットコインのみをコモディティとして区別する姿勢を維持している。

title: HashPortウォレット、Pontaポイントでステーブルコインの購入が可能に
contentSnippet: HashPortは12月1日、HashPort WalletでPontaポイントをBase上のUSDCやcbBTCに交換できる「オンランプ」機能と、暗号資産をau PAYギフトカードに変換する「オフランプ」機能を開始した。

title: Gunmen Steal $85,800 in Trinidad Crypto Ambush as Attacks on Holders Rise
contentSnippet: Armed robberies of crypto buyers are rising globally as criminals abandon digital hacks for brutal in-person confrontations.

title: Anthropic Starts Early IPO Prep Ahead of Possible 2026 Debut: Report
contentSnippet: Anthropic is reportedly exploring a public market debut while chasing a new funding round that could push its valuation past $300 billion.

title: カルシが米CNNの公式パートナーに、予測市場のリアルタイムデータを報道に統合
contentSnippet: 米予測市場プラットフォームのカルシがCNNと提携し公式予測市場パートナーになった。カルシのリアルタイムデータがCNN番組全体に統合され、政治的・文化的イベントの確率情報を報道に活用する。ソラナ上でのトークン化予測市場も開始した。

title: Ethereum Whale Buying Steps Up as Market Rebounds From Heavy Liquidations
contentSnippet: Large holders resumed sizeable Ethereum purchases this week as crypto prices recovered sharply from Monday’s wipeout.

title: ストラテジーCEO「米ドル準備金でビットコイン売却回避」、配当戦略を語る
contentSnippet: 米ストラテジー社CEOが今後の準備金や配当戦略を詳細に説明した。米ドル準備金で当面の配当資金を確保し、ビットコイン売却を回避する。レンディング参入の可能性も示唆した。

title: イーロンの「Xマネー」決済システム開発で人材募集　ソラナが支援表明
contentSnippet: イーロン・マスク氏のX Moneyが決済プラットフォームの技術責任者を募集。ソラナが協力を表明し、仮想通貨統合の可能性に注目が集まる。WeChat型スーパーアプリ実現への動きを解説。

title: Justice Department Seizes Domain Linked to Burma-Based Crypto Scam Compound
contentSnippet: The U.S. seizure comes a day after a sanctioned Cambodian group shut branches and froze withdrawals under regulatory pressure.

title: 「資産トークン化が金融のあり方を変革」ブラックロックのフィンクCEOらが論説
contentSnippet: ブラックロックのフィンクCEOらが現実資産（RWA）トークン化の可能性を様々な観点から解説した。トークン化の2つの大きな利点や規制当局の役割などにも言及している。

title: Grayscale Launches First US Chainlink ETF on NYSE Arca
contentSnippet: The product saw strong first-day trading after a shutdown-enabled filing path and updated SEC listing standards opened the way for its launch.

title: バイナンス傘下Trust Wallet、予測市場へのアクセス機能をローンチ　ポリマーケットなどに対応へ
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ウォレットのTrust Walletは、予測市場にアクセスできる機能をローンチ。まずはMyriad、ポリマーケット、カルシの3つの予測市場に対応する。

title: クラーケン、Backed買収　米国株のトークン化取引を拡大
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨取引所クラーケンがスイスのBacked Finance買収を発表。トークン化株式サービス「xStocks」は半年で取引高100億ドルを突破。RWA市場は2028年に2兆ドル規模へ成長見込み。

title: Kraken to Acquire Tokenization Platform Backed Finance as Crypto Exchange Extends Buying Spree
contentSnippet: The company said that the transaction would "accelerate the global adoption of xStocks."

title: Crypto Winter Is Not Coming, Myriad Users Say
contentSnippet: In a Myriad prediction market, just 9% of respondents expected a crypto winter.

title: Rizzmas is Back? Christmas Solana Meme Coin Wakes From Hibernation
contentSnippet: As December starts, meme coin traders are decorating their Christmas trees and buying up Rizzmas tokens.
